channel.title: Youtube Trending
channel.description:
Thank you to #Naraka Bladepoint for sponsoring this video. Play Naraka Bladepoint now ► https://gsght.com/c/x0jo2s - Checkout Jessie's Channel here: https://youtu.be/YV7AoY1sA74?si=fWStXtxCvpicuvMj
Support Psyonic here: https://www.psyonic.io/invest
Thank you to https://www.proactiveprosthetics.co.uk/ for the ongoing prosthetics support in the UK; they helped make this project possible!
Airbrush colors used on this project ► https://createxcolors.com/
GET MERCH ► https://www.Hacksmith.store Become a Hacksmith member get exclusive perks! ► https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCjgpFI5dU-D1-kh9H1muoxQ/join
SOCIAL Instagram ► http://www.instagram.com/thehacksmith TikTok ► https://www.tiktok.com/@thehacksmith Facebook ► http://www.facebook.com/thehacksmith Twitter ► http://twitter.com/thehacksmith Discord ► https://discordapp.com/invite/thehacksmith Merch ► https://www.hacksmith.store Website ► http://www.hacksmith.tech
SOFTWARE & Services: PCB Design ► https://www.altium.com/asp/hacksmith Get parts laser cut & shipped quickly to you ► sendcutsend.com/hacksmith Multi-Language Services ► https://bemultilingual.ca/ Video Review / Collaboration ► http://r.frame.io/pZq3N Video Editing ► Adobe Premiere CAD ► https://bit.ly/Solidworks4makers Our Avid CNC works best with Vectric Aspire ► https://www.vectric.com/products/aspire 3D printing filament & more @ Matterhackers ► https://www.matterhackers.com/?aff=7638
TOOLS / MACHINES: Our favorite toolkit ► https://www.ifixit.com/Shop/Hacksmith Our newest high tech laser cutter/engraver ► https://www.matterhackers.com/store/c/xtool-laser-engravers/?aff=7638 Our giant CNC Router ► https://www.avidcnc.com/ We proudly use high tech + high quality batteries from ► https://maxamps.com/ Our industrial grade high temp 3D printer ► https://www.pantheondesign.com/ Our Favorite Robot Dog & STEM learning platform ► http://bit.ly/3pMyqMR Ultra Fast 3D Printer (Bambu Lab) ► https://shareasale.com/r.cfm?b=2282157&u=3693696&m=138211&urllink=&afftrack= Laser Engraver ► https://bit.ly/OMTechLaser - Use code HACKSMITH5OFF Our Favorite Welding Table ► https://weldingtablesandfixtures.com/ CNC Mill - Tormach 1100MX ► https://hubs.ly/H0B8DWG0 CNC Mill - Tormach PCNC 440 ► https://hubs.ly/H0B8DYk0 CNC Lathe - Tormach 15L ► https://hubs.ly/H0B8Gcp0 Autofeed Bandsaw - Tormach AF50 ► https://hubs.ly/H0B8Gj10 CNC Waterjet Cutter ► https://www.wazer.com/ CNC Plasma Cutter ► http://bit.ly/EMTplasma 3D Scanner ► http://amzn.to/2pwbvTu Drills, drivers, grinders, saws, etc ► https://amzn.to/35qqbvy Mig Welder ► https://amzn.to/3dxFBzk Tig Welder ► https://amzn.to/3gmJclN Oscilloscope ► https://bit.ly/38sOzKw Multimeters ► https://bit.ly/2WKwPEQ Belt Grinders ► https://www.ameribrade.com/ Welding Table ► https://www.siegmund.com/en/Offers,6665.php Fantastic coolers ► https://www.chillymoose.ca/collections/coolers
CAMERA GEAR: Highspeed Cam - Chronos 2.1 ► https://www.krontech.ca/ Main shooter - Sony A7siii ► https://amzn.to/3amVsyN Insta360 Cameras ► https://store.insta360.com/product/x3?insrc=INR7JAT (free selfie stick with this link!) 4K Webcam ► https://store.insta360.com/product/link?insrc=INR7JAT Main mic - Rode Go II ► https://amzn.to/3toLsh3 Gimbal - DJI RS 2 ► https://amzn.to/3v0DFFs Tripods - Manfrotto 504X ► https://amzn.to/2QB1Onh Studio Lights - Nanlite ► https://amzn.to/3v6iWQr
Purchases made through some store links may provide some compensation to Hacksmith.
WARNING: THESE VIDEOS ARE FOR ENTERTAINMENT PURPOSES ONLY. PERSONAL USE OF VIDEO CONTENT IS AT YOUR OWN RISK. THE HACKSMITH IS A TRAINED PROFESSIONAL WHO KNOWS EXACTLY WHAT HE'S DOING. EXCEPT WHEN HE DOESN'T. DO NOT ATTEMPT TO RECREATE OR RE-ENACT ANYTHING SHOWN IN THESE VIDEOS.
MUSIC CREDITS: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1uPx9KFQnFC3JMVod1zN57b0K9R361fY0NRBmR_RpiPE/edit?usp=sharing
CHAPTERS: 0:00 We’re building what!? 1:13 How are we gonna do this? 2:02 Let’s Build 10:21 It’s Beautiful 11:20 Cross the Pond 16:26 The Gift
